title: Indonesia: new nation of Asia
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indonesia - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indonesia - Social life and customs
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Indonesia - Rural conditions
History/Indonesia - History - Autonomy and independence movements
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Indonesia - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Village communities
description: An Indonesian teacher tells the story of his country. Traces the history of Indonesia from Dutch rule to independence; shows life in crowded cities and in the home of village families; examines the natural resources, religions, art and industries of the country, pointing out how living standards are improving.
